text: Mr. Peabody & Sherman is a 2014 American-British 3D-computer animated comedy adventure movie directed by Rob Minkoff. It stars Ty Burrell, Ariel Winter, Max Charles, Stephen Colbert, and Leslie Mann. It has been released on February 7, 2014 in the United Kingdom and on March 7, 2014 in the United States. ==Cast== * Ty Burrell as Mr. Peabody * Max Charles as Sherman * Ariel Winter as Penny Peterson * Stephen Colbert as Paul Peterson * Leslie Mann as Patty Peterson * Stephen Tobolowsky as Principal Purdy * Stanley Tucci as Leonardo da Vinci * Allison Janney as Karen "Edwina" Grunion * Adam Alexi- Malle as French peasant * Patrick Warburton as King Agamemnon * Zach Callison as King Tut * Steve Valentine as Ay * Dennis Haysbert as Judge * Leila Birch as the WABAC * Karan Brar as Mason * Joshua Rush as Carl * Thomas Lennon as Italian Peasant #2 * Mel Brooks as Albert Einstein * Lake Bell as Mona Lisa * Lauri Fraser as Marie Antoinette * Nolan North as Maximilien Robespierre * Jess Harnell as George Washington, Abraham Lincoln, Bill Clinton and Isaac Newton * Tom McGrath as Odysseus * Al Rodrigo as Ajax the Lesser * Walt Dohrn as Spartacus ==References== Category:2014 computer-animated movies Category:2014 comedy movies Category:2014 adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British adventure movies Category:DreamWorks Animation movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Rob Minkoff
title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
